title: Bike Race Pro by T. F. Games v2.9
description:
This version of Bike Race has:

- All levels unlocked!
- No Ads!

In this simple and fast-paced physics-based free game, tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate/brake.

Features: 

- Multiplayer
- Simple controls 
- 14 addictive worlds 
- 112 challenging tracks
- 16 amazing bikes 
- Touch to accelerate, tilt to lean the bike
- Cool stunts

What's New: (Updated: October 15, 2013)

Halloween Bike is available
* FOR LIMITED TIME
Halloween Special Tracks are available
* Can you get 3 stars in this new challenging levels?

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.topfreegames.bikeraceproworld" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
